DESCRIPTION

Its name has many kratom users arguing whether this is truly the OG of the red veins. The Red Borneo Kratom bears in its title the origins of many kratom strains in the market but some fail to meet the lofty standards set by the reputation of its name. The Red Borneo, in its purest form, is a red vein experience worthy of your time.

What Is This Strain?

The Red Borneo Kratom originates from, you guessed it, the island of Borneo with overlapping territories in Indonesia and Malaysia. They are grown and harvested from unique plants called kratom from deep within the forests of the region.

This strain is a popular kratom within the region and Southeast Asia as a whole. Throughout the course of its existence, the Red Borneo strain has earned quite a potent reputation leading many opportunistic retailers to pirate its name in the hope of riding along with its success. Unfortunately, this isn’t an uncommon practice and its easy to be misled due to Red Borneo’s relative rarity. Nonetheless, when you do get your hands on a batch of fresh Red Borneo straight from the source, you’ll know it’s the real deal by way of its undeniably powerful effects.

The original Red Borneo product is a worthwhile experience due to its great quality as an alkaloid-rich strain. Its popularity despite its scarcity speaks of its caliber as a highly beneficial red vein strain What Are The Effects? The Red Borneo Kratom may be classified under the classic red variety. This strain may provide the user with solid feelings of calmness and relaxation. Slow, easy, and effortless, the strain works hard to convince users to take a load off and let go of their cares. That said, it has earned quite a prominent reputation as a nighttime kratom variety.

For discerning kratom troupers, the Red Borneo can provide an optimized experience provided you get the dosage correct. Effects may work differently among users and the key to a hick-free kratom encounter is a working knowledge of potency and tolerance. Experienced kratom users have reported benefiting from Red Borneo’s solid sedative effects with sufficient doses of the product.

In large part, the Red Borneo is a milder red vein compared to other products in the market. This opens up the discussion of it being a good starter strain for those looking to give kratom a try. What detracts from this, however, is the relative scarcity of the product in certain markets. It’s prudent to watch out also for less-than-pure knocks offs of this product to avoid the disappointment.

Similar Strains

The Red Borneo bears many similarities to its red vein brethren. Commonly, it can be associated with the Red Bali Kratom strain. The Red Bali Kratom may be considered the heavy-hitter in this category as it ably produces a strong sedative effect whereas the Red Borneo aims just a little lower in comparison.Others are also quick to establish the similarities with the Red Bentuangie or the Red Indo Kratom and even to say that they are the same. The Red Indo is largely considered a milder red vein experience and it is easy to say why the comparisons are made. The Red Borneo, after all, is a classic red vein experience without being too overwhelming.

Ingredients: Mitragyna Speciosa.
